fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
Trade, enlargement and neighborhood, common foreign and security policy, energy, public health, consumer policy. 
EU-Russia relations and EU-USA relations.
goals__remit: As a consultant, I am offering my services in the fields of international trade (including trade defense), competition, intellectual property, public procurement, large civil aircraft and enlargement. Geographically, I offer my services at national, bilateral and multilateral level. As far as specific geographical areas are concerned, my experience covers South-East Europe, Russia, North and South America, Asia (in particular Japan, China and ASEAN) and Africa (North and Sub-Saharan).
customers: Japan External Trade Organisation# Japan Machinery Center for Trade and Investment
